ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] IMPORTANT EQ ISSUE!!!!!ALL READ IMMMEDIATEDLY
ygData.msgSnippet: Always nice to hear from the k3W1 d00dz over at UOL.  If we want to do a little gloating - Lord British quit (maybe was fired - who knows what really
ygData.messageBody:
Always nice to hear from the "k3W1 d00dz" over at UOL. If we want to do a
little gloating - Lord British quit (maybe was fired - who knows what really
happened). And the two lead designers/Producers of Ultima Online left to
work for some other company.

Hmmm - I wonder who they're working for now?
